con:part.con:content: The ResourceAllocationAndSchedulingService allows clients to reserve bandwidth.

The authenticate operation must be invoked as the first operation before invoking any other operations on this service. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header. For authorization purposes user id must be included in the SOAP message header.

The value (1-31) identifies which day of a month the reservation should be made. The schedule will repeat every dayOfMonth, yearly. The format of the gMonthDay is --MM-DD Month January is 00, February is 01, March is 02, and so on. For example, Jan 24 should be presented as : --00-24

Time format for the DRAC WSDL interfaces : YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssTZD YYYY = four-digit year MM = two-digit month (01=January, etc.) DD = two-digit day of month (01 through 31) HH = two digits of hour (00 through 23) (am/pm NOT allowed) mm = two digits of minute (00 through 59) ss = two digits of second (00 through 59) TZD = time zone designator (+hh:mm or -hh:mm) Examples : 2007-03-25T09:30:00-05:00 2007-05-22T23:30:00+04:00 2007-06-11T10:30:00Z The value identifies which days of a week the reservation should be made. Value should be between 1 to 7, 1 being Sunday, and 7 being Saturday. For examle the following instance document describes a reservation request for Mondays and Wednesdays (Monday is 2, Wed. is 4) 2 4
